00014 #ifndef __TYPES_H
00015 #define __TYPES_H

00018 // DBL_MAX
00019 #include <values.h>
00020 
00021 
00022 #ifdef HAVE_STD_NAMESPACE
00023 // To make doc++ happier
00024 namespace std;
00025 
00026 using namespace std;
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 // Some integer types for convenience
00030 typedef  unsigned char      uint8;
00031 typedef  signed char        int8;
00032 typedef  unsigned short     uint16;
00033 typedef  signed short       int16;
00034 typedef  unsigned int       uint32;
00035 typedef  signed int         int32;
00036 
00037 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00038    typedef  unsigned __int64   uint64;
00039    typedef  __int64            int64;
00040 #else
00041    typedef  unsigned long long uint64;
00042    typedef  long long          int64;
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 typedef  uint8              byte;
00046 
00047 typedef  float    float32;
00048 typedef  double   float64;
00049 
00050 #define MAX_UINT8    uint8(0xff)
00051 #define MAX_INT8     int8(0x7f)
00052 #define MAX_UINT16   uint16(0xffffU)
00053 #define MAX_INT16    int16(0x7fff)
00054 #define MAX_UINT32   uint32(0xffffffffU)
00055 #define MAX_INT32    int32(0x7fffffff)
00056 #define MIN_INT8     int8(0x80)
00057 #define MIN_INT16    int16(0x8000)
00058 #define MIN_INT32    int32(0x80000000)
00059 #define MAX_FLOAT64  DBL_MAX
00060 
00061 #define REMOVE_UINT32_MSB(a) (uint32(a)&0x7fffffff)
00062 #define GET_UINT32_MSB(a) (uint32(a)&0x80000000)
00063 #define TOGGLE_UINT32_MSB(a) (uint32(a)^0x80000000)
00064 
00065 #ifdef _WIN32
00066    #define MAX_UINT64   0xffffffffffffffff
00067    #define MAX_INT64    0x7fffffffffffffff
00068 #else
00069    #define MAX_UINT64   ((uint64) -(uint64)1)
00070    #define MAX_INT64    int64(((uint64) -(uint64)1) >> 1)
00071    #define MIN_INT64    (int64(1)<<63)
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 #define MAX_BYTE     MAX_UINT8
00075 
00076 typedef const char* const_char_p;
00077 
00078 #endif // TYPES_H
